remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的类型转换为字符串类型。The most common type conversion is to and from a string type. 默认实现调用对象方法的对象是否有效且目标类型为字符串。The default implementation calls the method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果此方法无法将指定的对象转换为目标类型，它将传递异常。If this method cannot convert the specified object to the destination type, it passes a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.

The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的简单实现可以调用正确数据类型的 方法。An easy implementation of this method can call the method for the correct data type.
